entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:04 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
